topic.title: Procedure Number Of Attempts Observation - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.132"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10520)/@code="67543-9" Number of procedure attempts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10521)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10522)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10520)/@code="67543-9" Number of procedure attempts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10521)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10522)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05
